_header: Jesu as Thou may do Thy will
Note: Immediately follows and formerly included in 2794; see 5940.
Subjects: Jesus, prayers to; prayers, to Jesus
_description: A prayer for Christ’s protection — three cross-rhymed quatrans

CULDd564.First Lines:
Ihesu als þu may do þi willeand nathyn es þat
                    þe may lettewith þi grace my hert fulfillmy lufe & my
                    lykyngin þe sette…
CULDd564.Last Lines:
…and suffer me neuer to spillIhesu for þi pyte
                    Amen
